sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.rest" name="REST API Provider" state="published" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" namespace="sn_ws"> <description>REST API Framework to support RESTful Services</description> <requires> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.heisenberg" /> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.ui.virtual_host" name="rest" class="com.glide.rest.host.RESTAPIProvider" /> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RouteTemplateMatcher" class="com.glide.rest.util.RouteTemplateMatcher"/>
<extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="APIDoc" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.APIDocService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="APITableDesc" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.APIDocTableDescService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TableCRUDAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.table.TableAPIService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="TableCRUDV2API" class="com.glide.rest.service.table.TableAPIV2Service"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="ImportSetAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.impset.ImportSetAPIService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AggregateAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.stats.StatsAPIService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="AttachmentAPI" class="com.glide.rest.service.attachment.AttachmentAPIService"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.service" name="SessionNotificationAPI" class="com.glide.rest.session.impl.SessionNotificationService"/>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTMessageV2" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTMessageClient"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTResponseV2" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTResponse"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="RESTMessageTest" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.scriptable.ScriptableRESTMessageTestUIAction"/> <extension point="com.glide.rest.outbound.message_client" name="RESTMessageClient" class="com.glide.rest.outbound.RESTMessageClient"/>
<extension point="com.glide.transaction.monitor" name="RESTTransactionMonitor" class="com.glide.rest.processors.RESTTransactionMonitor"/>
<extension point="com.glide.rest.tools" name="GlideRecordFromMapConverter" class="com.glide.rest.util.GlideRecordFromMapConverter"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServicesRetriever" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableServicesRetriever"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ServiceInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableServiceInfo"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="VersionInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableVersionInfo"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ResourceInfo" class="com.glide.rest.service.doc.scriptable.ScriptableResourceInfo"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>REST API Framework to support RESTful Services</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.rest</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>REST API Provider</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.rest/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.ui.angular,com.glide.ui.heisenberg</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.glide.rest</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
